content:

{                                                                                                                                                                                             
 "error": {                                                                                                                                                                                   
  "message": "String does not match pattern: (#|MedicationOrder|VisionPrescription)",                                                                                                         
  "params": {                                                                                                                                                                                 
   "pattern": "(#|MedicationOrder|VisionPrescription)"                                                                                                                                        
  },                                                                                                                                                                                          
  "code": 202,                                                                                                                                                                                
  "dataPath": "/prescription/reference",                                                                                                                                                      
  "schemaPath": "/properties/prescription/allOf/1/properties/reference/pattern",

Real value of prescription.reference is {"reference": "http://www.optdocs.com/prescription/12345"}

Is this inconsistency?
It's not illegal. it doesn't really look right for a spec example though
but the claim stuff is very early
